sentences.en: I had to sift through a pile of papers looking for the lost article.
sentences.cn: 我不得不在一大堆报纸中折腾寻找一片丢失了的文章.

sentences.en: Mix water chestnut powder and 250 ml water to batter and sift.
sentences.cn: 马蹄粉与清水250毫升调成粉浆,用筛过滤.

sentences.en: Police are sifting through the evidence.
She had to sift ashes from the cinders.
sentences.cn: 她只好把煤渣中的灰筛出去.

sentences.en: Sift out the wheat from the chaff.
Sift sugar on top of the cake.
Sift the anthers onto unglazed, permeable paper, such as newspaper or paper toweling, for drying.
sentences.cn: 将花药筛到无光的 、 具渗透性的纸上, 如报纸或卫生纸, 以便花药干燥.

sentences.en: Sift the flour and baking powder into a medium-sized mixing bowl.
sentences.cn: 将面粉和发酵粉筛入中等大小的搅拌碗中。

sentences.en: Sift the flour into a bowl.
Sift the gravel and put the larger stones in another pile.
sentences.cn: 筛出碎石,把大点的石头堆成一堆.

sentences.en: Simon, Simon, Satan has asked to sift you as wheat.
sentences.cn: 主又说,西门, 西门, 撒但想要得着你们,好筛你们,像筛麦子一样.

sentences.en: Someone left a real mess for you to sift through.
sentences.cn: 有人给你制造了大堆的麻烦.

sentences.en: Their website can sift through candidates for jobs in the It'sphere.
sentences.cn: 他们的网站可以筛选出IT领域的求职者.

sentences.en: We should sift out the true from the false.
Why didn't you sift some sugar on to the cake?
sentences.cn: 你为什么没在糕点上撒点糖 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 筛撒，纷落，详察（sift的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_en: to put flour, sugar etc through a sieve or similar container in order to remove large pieces
